title: Giro d’Italia Stage 7: Tadej Pogačar Explodes GC With Next-Level TT: ‘Super Happy with This’
content:
Pogačar blasts to 2:36 GC lead and blows Giro apart, Thomas slides to third after Martínez makes best time trial of his career.

Read the full article at Giro d’Italia Stage 7: Tadej Pogačar Explodes GC With Next-Level TT: ‘Super Happy with This’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
